name: .TVDB File Extension
summary: Learn about .TVDB files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: A TVDB file is a database file used by Apple TV. It is stored within TV Library, which is the file that contains your Apple TV library. TVDB files contain information about either your Apple TV settings or your Apple TV library.

content: You are most likely to encounter a TVDB file after right-clicking TV Library and selecting Show Package Contents. Each TV Library file contains the following three TVDB files:
Application.tvbd: Stores Apple TV preferences and settings
Library Preferences.tvdb: Stores library preferences and settings
Library.tvdb: Stores information about each video in your Apple TV library
By default, TV Library is stored at Macintosh HD/​Users/​YourUserName/​Movies/​TV on Macs.

instructions: TVDB files are not meant to be opened or edited. Editing a TVDB file may affect Apple TV's ability to load and show your library.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
